title: Electronic Workbench Multisim 10.0 Portable.rar
description:
Electronic Workbench - Multisim v 10.0 - Portable

No install needed, no administrative rights needed, just copy all files to any drive / folder and use it.

Note: this portabilized app is NOT compatible with Microsoft Windows 7 BETA.


How To Install
-----------------

1) Copy all files to any drive / folder, except "Microsim 10 - Samples.rar"
   if you don't need the examples.

2) Execute "KeyGen.exe". This KeyGen generates three files:

	Multisim_MCU_PKG_100000.lic
	Multisim_ProPower_PKG_100000.lic
	Ultiboard_ProPower_PKG_100000.lic

   This files are the licence files. This licences files are machine
    dependant (computer name).

3) Execute "NI Licence Manager.exe". Goto "Options" --> "Install 
    Licence File...". Goto the drive / folder to the three licence
    files. Select the three files at the same time and press 
    "Open".

4) When the Licence Manager ask for overwrite the licence files,
    choose Yes. After the three licences, the Licence Manager
    show the three boxes in green. Close the Licence Manager.

5) Enjoy!!


Note:
--------

 This software has been portabilized with ThinApp (Vmware). ThinApp
  store the user configuration in this folder:

   c:/document and settings/username/program data/thinstall/multisim v10.0

 If you delete this folder, you need to run the KeyGen again to (re)install
  the licence files.
